title: Chiodos - The Heartless Control Everything EP (2003) FLAC
description:
Chiodos third EP released on January 25, 2003 on the label Search and Rescue Records. This EP is one of three that were released by Chiodos using there older title The Chiodos Bros.All the tracks on this torrent are atleast FLAC 16bit/44.1khz Lossless. Your getting 100% of what the artist wanted you to hear vs mp3 format for those who don't know the difference between the two formats, and the perks of FLAC.
